task.title: Create new blank PowerPoint presentation
task.shortdesc: In this section, you will learn how to create a blank PowerPoint presentation.

taskbody.prereq:
You must have
Microsoft PowerPoint 2007 or newer
Windows 7 or newer
Steps:

step.cmd: Open PowerPoint from the Desktop icon or the icon in the Start menu.

result.p: You will create a new blank PowerPoint presentation.
